name: mythicscribe
description: Offers support for MythicMobs scripting in VSCode

MythicScribe.alwaysEnabled.title: Always Enabled
MythicScribe.alwaysEnabled.description: Enable MythicScribe's functionalities in all files.

MythicScribe.regexForMythicmobsFile.title: Regex for MythicMobs File
MythicScribe.regexForMythicmobsFile.description: The regex used against each document's file path: if it matches, the document will be considered as being a MythicMobs one, enabling this extension.

MythicScribe.regexForMetaskillFile.title: Regex for MythicMobs Metaskills
MythicScribe.regexForMetaskillFile.description: The regex used against each document's file path: if it matches, the document will be considered as being a Metaskills one, enabling Metaskill files functionalities.

MythicScribe.enableShortcuts.title: Enable Shortcuts
MythicScribe.enableShortcuts.description: Enable text shortcuts for MythicMobs files. Changes apply on extension restart.

MythicScribe.enableEmptyBracketsAutomati.title: Enable Empty Brackets Automatic Removal
MythicScribe.enableEmptyBracketsAutomati.description: Enable the removal of empty curly brackets `{}` by moving the cursor past them. Changes apply on extension restart.

MythicScribe.enableFileSpecificSuggestio.title: Enable File Specific Suggestions
MythicScribe.enableFileSpecificSuggestio.description: Whether file specific suggestions (metaskill files, mob files) should be shown

MythicScribe.disableAcceptSuggestionOnEn.title: Reminder to Remove Accept Suggestion on Enter
MythicScribe.disableAcceptSuggestionOnEn.description: Enable the reminder to disable the editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter config.
